Title: Prohibits the siting and construction of battery energy storage systems and related facilities, systems, infrastructure, and substations of any scale and possessing any storage capacity on Staten Island
Summary: Prohibits the siting and construction of battery energy storage systems and related facilities, systems, infrastructure, and substations of any scale and possessing any storage capacity on Staten Island.
LawCode: Add ยง137, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend to the general municipal law, in relation to prohibiting the siting of battery energy storage system sites on Staten Island
